resources.string: Wake up the phone periodically to make sure the data connection stays on (drains battery): %s
Could not create log file. Make sure the SD card is available.
Do you really want to delete all the logs?
No connection tests have been done on a mobile connection.

The following summary lists the mobile cells and their connection test results. For each cell you can see the cell ids, the % of connection tests which succeeded, and the number of attempted connection tests. 

The worst cells are at the top of the list. 

Note that tests on WiFi or tests when the data connection was not "CONNECTED" are not included in the below summary.
Attached is a file with the full data of all tests.\n\n

<style type="text/css">
table {
 border-collapse: collapse;
 border: 1px #fd8900 solid;
}
th {
 background-color: #fff300;
 color: #fd8900;
 border: 1px #fd8900 solid;
 text-transform: capitalize;
}
td {
 white-space: pre;
 border-right: 1px #fd8900 solid;
 padding-left: 5px;
 padding-right: 5px;
}
tr.even td {
 background-color:#ffffe1;
}
tr.odd td {
 background-color:#fff;
}
td.pass { 
 color:#0A0; 
 font-weight:bold;
}
td.fail { 
 color:#F00; 
 font-weight:bold;
}
</style>
